ygData.subject: Re: Trivial Bow Levels?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey All, I don t know suppose anyone out here has a list (or knows where to get one) of the levels at which different bows become trivial? If you know any
ygData.messageBody:
Hey All,

I don't know suppose anyone out here has a list (or knows where to get one)
of the levels at which different bows become trivial?
If you know any levels for certain, send them to me via E-Mail and I wiil
start to compile them as a refernce for others to use.

Second question:
At only 5.5pp a pop, I'm not worried about the money... What is a good skill
level to try the Carved Elm Bow? - Can you put cams on them or make 'smooth
elm'? I need to upgrarde my rough, hemp-stringed, elm bow and don't have
much skill and I don't want to buy... because of that whole 'ranger pride'
thing :)
